project-basis: I used Laravel to create my API's endpoints that I consumed using React.
project-challenges: A lot actually, I had to learn all the Javascript ecosystem requirement from setting up ES6, TypeScript, Babel, Webpack... I also learned a lot about API's endpoints, authentication using JWT. State management using MobX and localStore of the browser.
project-purpose: It helps you apply Deliberate Practice with Spaced Repetition.
project-inspiration: It's all started when I read a book about Deliberate Practice.
project-lessons-learned: Besides technical skills that I mentioned in challenges. I learned a lot about myself, how to get things done. How to manage a project alone.
project-accomplishments: Being able to stay focused on the goal.
project-subtitle: Your Personal Practice Assistant to Learn The Right Way.
